patterns: What exams can I take after 12th?
What are my career options after 12th?
I just finished 12th grade, what's next?
After finishing high school, what's the next step?
What should I do after completing 12th grade?
Tell me about career paths after 12th grade
What career should I pursue after 12th?
responses:
There are various exams you can consider after completing 12th such as MHT-CET, JEE, NEET, CLAT, NDA, BITSAT, UGEE, etc.
Which specific exam are you interested in?
After 12th, you have several options like JEE Main, NEET, CLAT, NDA, BITSAT, UGEE, and more. Which one would you like to know about?
Post 12th, there are numerous exams available including JEE Main, NEET, CLAT, NDA, BITSAT, UGEE, and others. What information are you seeking?

patterns: What's the deal with JEE Main?
Can you tell me about JEE Main exam?
responses:
Purpose - For Admission in B. E./B. Tech., B. Arch., B. Planning.
Eligibility - Class 12 pass (PCM)
Application mode - Online
Documents:
1) Scanned image of candidates' photograph,
2) Scanned image of signature.
3) Scanned image of PwD certificate, if applicable.
4) Category certificate, if applicable.
5) The recent photograph should be either in colour or black and white with 80 per cent face (without mask) visible including ears. The photo should be taken against a white background.
6) Scanned photograph and signature should be in JPG/JPEG format only and clearly visible.
7) The size of the scanned photograph should be between 10 kb to 200 kb.
8) The size of the scanned signature should be between 4 kb to 30 kb and clearly visible.
9) The size of the scanned copy of the category and/or PwD certificate (SC/ST/OBC/EWS etc.) should be in pdf between 50kb to 300kb and clearly visible.
10) If it is found at any time that the candidate has used/uploaded the photograph, signature, and certificate(s) of someone else or has tampered his/her admit card/result/scorecard, these acts will be treated as Unfair Means (UFM) Practices.

patterns: I want to know about JEE Advanced exam
Can you explain JEE Advanced to me?
responses:
Purpose- Admission in UG programmes in IITs
Eligibility - Class 12 Pass (PCM)
Application mode -Online.
Documents: 1) Birth certificate or Class X certificate
2) Class XII certificate for candidates appearing for the first time in 2023 or whose Board released the Class XII results for the academic session 2021-22 after October 25, 2022.
3) If available, a Class XII mark sheet for the 2024 exam.
4) Identity proof like Citizenship certificate, Foreign Passport, OCI/PIO Card.
5) If the candidate's name differs from the one on the Class X certificate, a Gazette notification for the name change.
6) For GEN-EWS/OBC-NCL category, the recommended certificate issue date should be on or after April 1, 2024. In case of non-availability, a Declaration in Lieu of GEN-EWS Certificate/OBC-NCL certificate is required.
7) For SC/ST category, the latest Caste (for SC) or tribe (for ST) certificate following the Government of India's guidelines (Refer to the official JEE Advanced 2024 information brochure for more details).

patterns: I want to know about BITSAT exam
Can you explain BITSAT to me?
responses:
Purpose - Admission in Integrated First Degree programmes in BITS Pilani, Goa & Hyderabad campuses.
Eligibility - Class 12 pass (PCM)
Application mode - Online
Documents:1) Net banking/credit card/debit card details
2) Candidate's Photograph - 50 KB to 100 KB in JPEG/JPG format
3) Candidate's Signature - 10 KB to 100 KB in JPEG/ JPG format.
4) An attested photocopy of the Class X pass/ Matriculation/Secondary School certificate issued by the Board
5) An attested photocopy of the mark sheet of the qualifying examination and any other higher University/Board examinations passed

patterns: I want to know about MHT-CET exam
Can you explain MHT-CET to me?
responses:
Purpose - for admission in engineering,pharmacy,agriculture
Eligibility - passed 12th or the equivalent examination
Application Mode – Online
Documents
1) Class 10th Mark Sheet: Required for entering your Date of Birth and Roll Number details.
2) Aadhaar Card: Helpful for entering your Full Name, Father & Mother’s Name, and Communication Address.
3) Class 12th Details: Enter your Class 12th details, including the Name of the School, Passing Year, etc.
4) Category Certificate: If you belong to reserved categories, specify your caste/category in the application form.
5) Mobile Number & E-Mail ID: You must have a valid Mobile Number and e-mail ID for registration.

patterns: I want to know about UGEE exam
Can you explain UGEE to me?
responses:
Purpose - Admission in Dual Degree (B.Tech + MSc. by Research) programmes at IIIT Hyderabad.
Eligibility - Class 12 Pass (PCM)
Application mode - Online.
Documents: 1) Class X Marksheet. 2) Class XII Marksheet.
3) Candidate’s Photograph
4) Candidate’s Signature.
5) Passing Certificate
6) Migration Certificate

patterns: Tell me about Indian Navy B.Tech Entry Scheme
What is Indian Navy B.Tech Entry Scheme?
Indian Navy B.Tech Entry Scheme details
I want to know about Indian Navy B.Tech Entry Scheme
Can you explain Indian Navy B.Tech Entry Scheme to me?
responses:
Purpose - Admission in Indian Navy B.Tech course
Eligibility - Class 12 passed
Application mode - Online
Documents:
1. Aadhaar Card: A valid proof of identity.
2. Residential Proof: Document verifying your residential address.
3. Proof of Date of Birth: Such as a birth certificate.
4. Matriculation Certificate: Required for entering your Date of Birth and Roll Number details.
5. 10+2 Pass Certificate: Scanned copy of your Class 12th mark sheet.
6. JEE (Main)-2023 Scorecard: If you have appeared for JEE (Main) in 2023.
7. Scanned Passport-Size Photograph: Ensure that the photograph meets the specified dimensions and clarity requirements.

patterns: Tell me about Indian Navy Sailors Recruitment
What is Indian Navy Sailors Recruitment?
I want to know about Indian Navy Sailors Recruitment
Can you explain Indian Navy Sailors Recruitment to me?
responses:
Purpose - Admission in 24 weeks Basic training at INS Chilka followed by Professional training
Eligibility - Class 12 (Maths and
Physics/Chem./Bio/Computer Sc.)
Application mode - Online, By Post
a. Candidates need to punch and firmly tie the following documents with a strong thread to the Indian Navy SSR and AA application form in the sequence stated below
b. Completed application form with a spare recent passport size photograph.
c. Self-attested copies of the following certificates—
d. Matric /equivalent certificate for date of birth verification
e. Mark sheet and certificate of Diploma/Higher Board examination/ Matriculation as applicable.
f. Domicile certificate
g. Two self-addressed envelopes of size 22 x 10 cms.
h. Candidates need to affix Rs. 10/- stamp on one envelope and submit one envelope without the stamp along with the application form.
i. Candidates need to note the colour specifications of the envelopes—white colour envelop is for AA entry and brown colour envelope is for SSR/MR/NMR entry.
j. On the envelope containing the application, candidates should clearly mention—the type of entry, the state, exam percentage, and name of the exam passed. For instance: AA(130BATCH)-KERALA-65%-(10+2 Science), or SSR (2/2011 BATCH) -HARYANA- 76% – (10+2 Science)

patterns: Tell me about Indian Army Technical Entry Scheme
What is Indian Army Technical Entry Scheme?
Indian Army Technical Entry Scheme details
I want to know about Indian Army Technical Entry Scheme
Can you explain Indian Army Technical Entry Scheme to me?
responses:
Purpose-Technical Entry to Army
Eligibility-Class 12 PCM
Apply-Online
Documents:
1. Photocopy of Call letter.
2. Photocopy of Application form.
3. 12th board certificate ( if it is not avail then bonafide certificate of college)
4. 12th mark sheet.
5. 10th board certificate.
6. 10th mark sheet.
7. NCC Certificate ( if you have).
8. Extra ciricular activity certificate.
9. 20 passport size photo.

patterns: Tell me about National Defence Academy and Naval Academy Examination
What is National Defence Academy and Naval Academy Examination?
National Defence Academy and Naval Academy Examination details
I want to know about National Defence Academy and Naval Academy Examination
Can you explain National Defence Academy and Naval Academy Examination to me?
responses:
Purpose - Admission to Army and Air Force wings of NDA and 4 years B. Tech course for the Indian Naval Academy Course (INAC)
Eligibility- Class 12, 12 Passed
Application mode - Online
Documents:
a. Scanned images of photograph and signature
b. Photo-identity card in PDF format (Aadhar Card / Voter Card/PAN Card/ Passport/ Driving License/ School Photo ID/Any other photo ID Card issued by the State / Central Government)
c. Marksheet and admit card of Class 10 and 12

patterns: I want to know about NIFT exam
Can you explain NIFT to me?
responses:
Purpose-For Admission in Design, Management and Technology for the international fashion business
Eligibility- Class 12, 12+, Graduate
Application mode -Online, By Post
Documents:
1. Valid Email Id
2. Details of Educational Qualification
3. Personal Details
4. Certificate of Disability (if applicable)
5. ST/ SC/ OBC Certificate (if applicable)
6. Scanned Image of Signature
7. Scanned Image of Photograph
8. Details of Credit/Debit card in case of making payment online

patterns: I want to know about AIEED exam
Can you explain AIEED to me?
responses:
Purpose-Admission in 4 years UG level programmes in Design
Eligibility-Class 11, 12 Application mode - Online
Documents:
1. Passport-size photograph: You’ll need to upload a recent passport-size photograph.
2. Signature: Upload a scanned copy of your signature.
3. 10th and 12th mark sheets: Provide scanned copies of your 10th and 12th-grade mark sheets.
4. Other educational certificates (if applicable): If you have any additional educational certificates, scan and upload them.
5. Portfolio of design work (if applicable): If you have a design portfolio, make sure to include it in your application.
6. Remember to carry your AIEED Admit Card along with a valid ID proof to the exam center for verification. Accepted ID proofs include:
7. Driving License
8. Aadhar Card
9. Passport
10. 10th-grade mark sheet
11. Last graduation mark sheet

patterns: I want to know about CUET exam
Can you explain CUET to me?
responses:
Central University Entrance Test (CUET) for UG courses
Purpose : Admission into all UG Programmes in all Central Universities
Eligibility - Class 12
Application mode - Online
Documents:
1. Scanned copy of recent color passport-size photograph: Ensure that the photograph meets the specified dimensions and clarity requirement.
2. Scanned copy of signature (black ink): Your signature should be clerar and legible.
3. Government-issued photo identity proof: Acceptable proofs include Aadhar card, PAN card, Voter ID, or Passport.
4. Banking details: You’ll need these for payment of the CUET fees.
5. Valid phone number
6. Active email ID
7. Scanned copy of Class 10th mark sheet
8. Scanned copy of Class 12th mark sheet

patterns: I want to know about HSEE exam
Can you explain HSEE to me?
responses:
IIT Madras Humanities and Social Sciences Entrance Examination (HSEE)
Purpose-Admission in integrated Master of Arts (M.A.) programme
Eligibility- Class 12
Application mode - Online
Documents:
1. Scanned photograph and signatures of the candidate: Ensure that the photograph and signature meet the specified dimensions and clarity requirements.
2. Scanned copy of Class 10 examination certificate: This serves as proof of your name and date of birth.
3. Scanned copy of 10+2 class mark sheet (if already passed 10+2 examination): Provide a clear scan of your 12th-grade mark sheet.

patterns: I want to know about TISS-BAT exam
Can you explain TISS-BAT to me?
responses:
Purpose-Admission in B.A. Social Sciences programme in any of three Campuses i.e. Tuljapur, Guwahati and Hyderabad
Eligibility- Class 12, 12+
Application mode -Online
Documents:
1. Admit Card of TISS BAT 2023: Make sure you have your admit card ready for the exam.
2. Score Card of TISS BAT 2023: Keep your scorecard accessible.
3. Class 10 certificate: Provide a scanned copy of your Class 10 examination certificate as proof of your name and date of birth.
4. Class 12 certificate: Similarly, include a scanned copy of your 12th-grade mark sheet.
5. Caste/Category certificate (if applicable): If you belong to a category other than the general category, ensure you have the relevant caste/category certificate issued by the competent authority.

patterns: Tell me about The English and Foreign Languages University Hyderabad Entrance Test
What is The English and Foreign Languages University Hyderabad Entrance Test?
The English and Foreign Languages University Hyderabad Entrance Test details
I want to know about The English and Foreign Languages University Hyderabad Entrance Test
Can you explain The English and Foreign Languages University Hyderabad Entrance Test to me?
responses: The English and Foreign Languages University Hyderabad Entrance Test is an entrance exam conducted by EFL University Hyderabad for admission to undergraduate programs in English and foreign languages. It assesses candidates' proficiency in English, language aptitude, and general awareness.

The English and Foreign Languages University Hyderabad Entrance Test is conducted by EFL University Hyderabad for admission to its undergraduate programs. It evaluates candidates' proficiency in English, language aptitude, and general awareness through an entrance exam.

The English and Foreign Languages University Hyderabad Entrance Test is an exam conducted by EFL University Hyderabad for admission to its undergraduate programs. It tests candidates' proficiency in English, language aptitude, and general awareness.
